lifeline.translation[0].definitions[0].d: something which someone depends on completely
lifeline.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The telephone is her lifeline to the rest of the world.
The organization has proved to be a lifeline for thousands of needy families.
lifeline.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a rope used for saving people in danger, especially at sea
lifeline.translation[1].definitions[0].d: something a country, organization etc depends on completely
lifeline.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Hawaii has always been able to count on tourism, itseconomic lifeline.
